item.title: Apax 支持的周转箱供应商 Tosca 正在与贷款人谈判现金事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿帕克斯合伙公司（Apax Partners）支持的托斯卡服务有限责任公司（Tosca Services LLC）正在与一些债权人商讨新贷款事宜，以增加公司的现金流。【原文：Apax Partners-backed Tosca Services LLC is holding discussions with some creditors for a new loan that would give the company a cash boost, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国经济仅靠一个引擎继续滑行
item.description: 中国经济今年的持续增长有赖于工业生产，而未来一周的数据将提供线索，说明这种支持的力度有多大。【原文：China’s economy has leaned on industrial production to keep growing this year, and data in the coming week will provide clues on how strong that support remains.】

item.title: 巴西卢拉批准绿色氢能法案，否决税收减免政策
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）批准了建立低碳氢法律框架的立法，但否决了给予某些税收减免的措辞。【原文：Brazil President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva approved legislation establishing a legal framework for low-carbon hydrogen, but vetoed language that would have granted certain tax credits.】

item.title: 信贷交易员急于为美国经济担忧套期保值
item.description: 随着人们对美国经济和欧洲消费者健康状况的担忧加剧，债务投资者正在加码购买企业债券违约保险。【原文：Debt investors are loading up on insurance against corporate bond defaults as concerns mount about the health of the US economy and the European consumer.】

item.title: 美国液化天然气出口商 Venture 寻求法院对 Kiewit 下达命令
item.description: 美国液化天然气开发商 Venture Global LNG 公司正在请求法院下令阻止向壳牌石油公司透露机密信息，因为两家公司在路易斯安那州的一个设施上存在合同纠纷。【原文：Venture Global LNG Inc., a US liquefied natural gas developer, is requesting a court order to prevent the release of confidential information to Shell Plc amid contract disputes between the two companies over a facility in Louisiana.】

item.title: 弗雷泽和苏世民将在纽约会见英国新总理里夫斯
item.description: 英国新任财政大臣瑞秋-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将在访问纽约期间会见华尔街高层管理人员，包括花旗集团首席执行官简-弗雷泽（Jane Fraser）和黑石集团的史蒂夫-施瓦茨曼（Steve Schwarzman）。首席执行官简-弗雷泽（Jane Fraser）和黑石集团（Blackstone Inc.【原文：The UK’s new chancellor, Rachel Reeves, is set to meet top Wall Street executives including Citigroup Inc. Chief Executive Officer Jane Fraser and Blackstone Inc.’s Steve Schwarzman on a visit to New York.】

item.title: 热带风暴黛比穿过海湾向佛罗里达州移动
item.description: 迈阿密（美联社）— 星期六，热带低气压在古巴以北增强为热带风暴黛比（Debby），据最新预测，当它穿过墨西哥湾与佛罗里达州相撞时，它将变成飓风。【原文：MIAMI (AP) — A tropical depression strengthened into Tropical Storm Debby north of Cuba on Saturday and was newly predicted to become a hurricane as it moves through the Gulf of Mexico on a collision course with Florida.】

item.title: 华尔街周阿斯彭经济战略集团的见解
item.description:
《华尔街周刊》访问科罗拉多州阿斯彭，深入了解美联储、全球经济和美国总统大选

。【原文：

Wall Street Week visits Aspen, Colorado, for insights into the Federal Reserve, global economy and the US presidential election

】

item.title: 里夫斯为英国债务行动敞开大门，以释放数十亿资金
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）拒绝再次承诺不改变她在11月做出的债务目标，因为有人猜测她正准备加大借贷力度，以填补公共财政中164亿英镑（约合210亿美元）的缺口。【原文：UK Chancellor Rachel Reeves is refusing to recommit to a pledge made in November not to change her debt target amid speculation she is preparing to ramp up borrowing to fill a £16.4 billion ($21 billion) hole in the public finances.】

item.title: 巴金称经济健康，关键问题围绕就业市场
item.description: 里士满联邦储备银行行长托马斯-巴尔金说，美国经济状况良好，但目前还不清楚劳动力市场是在恢复正常的招聘率，还是在更严重地恶化。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond President Thomas Barkin said the US economy is in good shape, though it’s unclear whether the labor market is getting back to normal rates of hiring or more seriously deteriorating.】

item.title: 新西兰可能增加国家贷款机构的资本以应对竞争对手
item.description: 新西兰正在考虑增加其国有贷款机构资本金的计划，试图使其与澳大利亚所有的银行相比更具竞争力。【原文：New Zealand is considering plans to increase the capital of its state-owned lender to try make it more competitive with Australian-owned banks.】

item.title: 肯尼亚因加税逆转被惠誉降至 "垃圾 "级
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）以财政风险为由下调了肯尼亚的信用评级，原因是鲁托总统撤回了一项将提高税收的法案，以回应抗议活动。【原文：Kenya’s debt fell deeper into junk territory after Fitch Ratings cut its credit rating for the country, citing fiscal risks after President Ruto responded to protests by withdrawing a bill that would raise taxes.】

item.title: 加密货币高管下周将会见白宫顾问
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，加密货币行业的高管们正计划下周与白宫助手和众议员罗-卡纳（Ro Khanna）会面，讨论围绕数字资产的问题，并为下届政府提出政策变革建议。【原文：Executives from the cryptocurrency industry are planning to meet with White House aides and Representative Ro Khanna next week to discuss concerns around digital assets and propose policy changes for the next administration, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Arbor Realty 公布季度业绩后股价上涨
item.description: 公寓楼贷款公司 Arbor Realty Trust Inc.周五股价上涨超过 1%，此前该公司公布了季度财报，并披露了更多做空者认为不当的交易细节。【原文：Shares of Arbor Realty Trust Inc., a lender to apartment buildings, gained more than 1% on Friday after the company posted quarterly results and disclosed more detail about transactions that a short-seller had said were improper.】

item.title: 对冲基金自 2016 年以来首次看跌大宗商品
item.description: 对冲基金自2016年以来首次转而主要看跌大宗商品期货，显示出在经济放缓的担忧下对原材料需求的悲观情绪加重。【原文：Hedge funds have turned predominantly bearish on commodities futures for the first time since 2016, showing increased pessimism on demand for raw materials amid economic slowdown fears.】

item.title: 最可靠的交易失败，华尔街的平静之年戛然而止
item.description: 多年来，华尔街对一切都了如指掌。如果股市反弹面临危险，那就做大科技股的安全交易。担心经济放缓？美联储就是你的后盾。【原文：For years, Wall Street had it all figured out. If the stock rally is in danger, pile into the Big Tech safety trade. Scared the economy is slowing down? The Federal Reserve has your back.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利将允许顾问向富裕客户提供比特币 ETF
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根士丹利为数千名财务顾问开了绿灯，让他们最快在下周招揽符合条件的客户购买现货比特币交易所交易基金。【原文：Morgan Stanley gave thousands of financial advisers the green light to solicit eligible clients to purchase spot-Bitcoin exchange-traded funds as soon as next week, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 对冲基金在大跌中削减看涨布伦特原油的赌注，为 2022 年以来最多
item.description: 在算法抛售和对需求日益担忧的情况下，对冲基金将布伦特原油的看涨押注削减了近两年来最多的一次。【原文：Hedge funds slashed bullish wagers on Brent crude by the most in almost two years amid an algorithmic selloff and increasing concerns about demand.】

item.title: 尽管谷物价格下跌，美国农田价值仍创下新高
item.description: 尽管人们预期农作物价格下跌和利率上升将给农业投资带来压力，但美国农田的价值仍在不断上涨。【原文：American farmland values keep going up, despite expectations that tumbling crop prices and elevated interest rates will pressure agriculture investments.】

item.title: 派拉蒙全球公司在 Skydance 收购文件争夺战中取得优势
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）准备击败向一家养老基金提交内部文件的要求，该基金对派拉蒙被 Skydance Media 公司斥资 24 亿美元收购一事提出了质疑，因为 Skydance Media 公司将这家好莱坞传奇制片厂的控制权转交给了制片人大卫-埃里森（David Ellison）。【原文：Paramount Global is poised to defeat a demand to turn over internal files to a pension fund that’s raising questions about its $2.4 billion acquisition by Skydance Media that shifts control of the storied Hollywood studio to producer David Ellison.】

item.title: 美国就业数据疲软后加拿大央行可能加快降息步伐
item.description: 市场押注加拿大央行将在今年剩余的每次利率决定中降息，因为美国劳动力市场的松动速度似乎快于预期。【原文：Markets are betting the Bank of Canada will cut at each of its remaining interest rate decisions this year as the labor market in the US looks to be loosening faster than expected.】

item.title: 拜朱的贷款人要求阻止向印度板球委员会付款
item.description: 美国贷方正在寻求冻结陷入困境的印度教育科技公司 Byju's 的一名停职董事的资产，理由是他的现金应该用来支付贷方，而不是拖欠印度板球管理委员会的债务。【原文：American lenders are seeking to freeze the assets of a suspended director of the troubled Indian educational tech firm Byju’s, arguing his cash should be used to pay them, not debt owed to India’s governing board for cricket.】

item.title: Enbridge 寻求批准向土著社区出售股权
item.description: Enbridge 公司正在寻求监管部门批准将其在不列颠哥伦比亚省天然气管道系统中的股份出售给土著团体，这可能预示着这些社区与加拿大能源公司之间的又一次合作。【原文：Enbridge Inc. is seeking regulatory approval to sell a stake in its British Columbia natural gas pipeline system to Indigenous groups, potentially presaging another partnership between those communities and Canadian energy companies.】

item.title: 马杜罗坚守权力，粉碎委内瑞拉债券持有人的希望
item.description: 在不到一周的时间里，委内瑞拉的债权人从猜测政治过渡会将债券价格推向多高的水平，到权衡债券价格会下跌多少。【原文：In less than a week, Venezuela creditors have gone from speculating how high a political transition could push bond prices to weighing how far they will fall.】

item.title: 加密货币贷款机构 Genesis 完成重组，开始支付款项
item.description: 加密贷款机构 Genesis Global 和相关公司完成了破产重组，并开始向债权人分配约 40 亿美元的数字资产和现金。【原文：Crypto lender Genesis Global and related companies completed its bankruptcy restructuring and began distributing about $4 billion in digital assets and cash to creditors.】

item.title: CFPB 的乔普拉对高价消费债务的增加表示担忧
item.description: 美国最高消费者金融监管机构罗希特-乔普拉（Rohit Chopra）说，他对一些美国消费者面临的高利率信用卡和贷款的影响感到担忧，他的机构正在努力确保这种影响不会蔓延到少数产品之外。【原文：Rohit Chopra, the top US consumer financial watchdog, says he’s concerned about the impact of high-rate credit cards and loans facing some American consumers, and his agency is working to ensure the fallout doesn’t spread beyond a few products.】

item.title: J.J Crew 在多年前颠覆了借贷市场后，希望重返债务市场
item.description: 据知情人士透露，美国零售商 J. Crew 正在了解投资者对其四年前用于摆脱破产的贷款进行再融资的兴趣。【原文：US retailer J. Crew is feeling out investor interest in refinancing a loan it used to exit bankruptcy four years ago, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 工人罢工，奋进号生产目标岌岌可危
item.description: 奋进矿业公司（Endeavour Mining Plc）位于塞内加尔的萨博达拉-马萨瓦（Sabodala-Massawa）矿场的工人周四开始罢工，这可能会阻碍该公司实现年度生产目标。【原文：Workers at Endeavour Mining Plc’s Sabodala-Massawa mine in Senegal started a strike on Thursday that could hamper the company’s ability to reach annual production target.】

item.title: 比特币跌破 63,000 美元，创世公司开始分发代币
item.description: 随着避险情绪席卷金融市场，以及 Genesis 公司在完成破产重组后开始向债权人分配数字资产，比特币一度跌破 63,000 美元。【原文：Bitcoin briefly dropped below $63,000 as risk aversion swept through financial markets and Genesis began distributing digital assets to creditors after completing its bankruptcy restructuring.】
